predicate.note: Frames file for 'fool' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Trompe l'oeil painting is meant [*-1] to fool the eye , but Robert Lawrence Trotter , 35 , of Kennett Square , Pa. , took his fooling seriously .

roleset.name: to engage in idle or frivolous activity

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: Jeffrey Tarter , editor of SoftLetter , a Watertown , Mass. , industry newsletter , says : `` I 've seen a lot of people fooling around on the fringes of filtering information .
